text: Date honey or Date syrup (in Arabic: Rub, in Hebrew: Silan) is a sweet syrup made from dates. It is very popular in North Africa and Middle East cuisines. In the Iranian cuisine and the Greek cuisine, it is also used to sweeten Tahini. == Other websites == * Category:Middle Eastern foods Category:Libyan food Category:Iraqi food Category:Palestinian food Category:Israeli food Category:Spreads Category:Natural resources
title: Date honey
